resources.string:
-The main goal is to deactivating the bomb by locating each wire of the bomb so that you can crack the pin code before the time runs out.

 -To correctly defuse a wire you will press and hold the panel until you see a defuse image appear.

 -The board will clear when a empty tile is pressed and numbers will be displayed accordingly on the grid.

 -The number inside the panel reflect the number of wires that are surrounding the square.

 -There will be colored number panels that will appear around the board as you further disarm the bomb.

 -These panels will contain a random number that you are to used as the pin code that you will input to fully disarm the bomb.

 -Before trying to input the pin code into the bomb you will have to full disarm all the wires first.

 -You can change the difficulty of the game in the settings option in the main menu. The difficulty changes the area of the grid and the time you have.

 -Finally, just have fun!
